eu_initiatives: Litgrid takes active participation on topics and legal initiatives related with electricity network codes and guidelines, electricity market integration, synchronisation with the continental European grids, and international power links
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest

goals__remit: Litgrid, the Lithuanian electricity transmission system operator, maintains a stable operation of the national power system, controls electricity flows, and enables competition in an open domestic electricity market. Litgrid is responsible for integrating the national power system into the European power infrastructure and electricity market. While realising the goal of Lithuania‘s energy independence, we promote a culture of responsibility, creativity and dialogue
relevant_communication: The current Litgrid priority on national, regional and EU level is synchronization with the Continental European grid. Therefore, the company implemented strategic electricity cross-border links, namely, NordBalt (Lithuania-Sweden) and LitPol Link (Lithuania-Poland), which is a key factor to integrate the national power system into the European power infrastructure and electricity market
